author: Karl Lawrenz
title: Karl Lawrenz
text: I'm just writing this review to somehow contact support. I had an issue where my password was wrong after I tried to login for the first time. I tried resetting the password but the link given is broken. I can't login to submit a ticket, and I can't do anything please help
